items.summary: Fix the layering/overlap on Screen 1 so that the "Hey Love" and "14.02.2026" text is not rendered behind/under the heart emoji (heart seal). Apply this change ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3].

On Screen 1 (envelope scene), ensure the selected envelope content block is visually centered on the screen (not shifted toward the left). Apply this change ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3].
